body:
This is for current git head (1e92b27540). Compile with:

    ./autogen.sh
    ./configure --with-incompatible-bdb --with-utils
    make -j8

Error is:

      OBJCXXLD qt/bitcoin-qt
    qt/libbitcoinqt.a(qt_libbitcoinqt_a-paymentserver.o): In function 
        `google::protobuf::internal::GetEmptyStringAlreadyInited[abi:cxx11]()':
    /usr/include/google/protobuf/generated_message_util.h:80: undefined reference to  
       `google::protobuf::internal::empty_string_[abi:cxx11]'
    /usr/bin/ld: qt/libbitcoinqt.a(qt_libbitcoinqt_a-paymentserver.o): relocation R_X86_64_PC32 
        against undefined symbol `_ZN6google8protobuf8internal13empty_string_B5cxx11E' can 
        not be used when making a shared object; recompile with -fPIC
    /usr/bin/ld: final link failed: Bad value
title: Compile error on Debian x86_64
